(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBZ 's)
      (ADJP (JJ interesting)))
    (. .)))


nsubj(interesting-3, It-1)
cop(interesting-3, 's-2)
root(ROOT-0, interesting-3)


(ROOT
  (SBAR
    (WHADVP (WRB When))
    (S
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (VBP google)
        (NP (DT the) (NN word) (NN Saviour)))
      (, ,))))


advmod(google-3, When-1)
nsubj(google-3, you-2)
root(ROOT-0, google-3)
det(Saviour-6, the-4)
nn(Saviour-6, word-5)
dobj(google-3, Saviour-6)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (RB almost) (PDT all) (DT the) (NNS hits))
    (VP (VBP refer)
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP (NNP Jesus) (NNP Christ))))
    (. .)))


advmod(hits-4, almost-1)
predet(hits-4, all-2)
det(hits-4, the-3)
nsubj(refer-5, hits-4)
root(ROOT-0, refer-5)
prep(refer-5, to-6)
nn(Christ-8, Jesus-7)
pobj(to-6, Christ-8)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP guess)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (ADVP (RB just))
          (VP (VBZ sums)
            (PRT (RP up))
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WP who))
              (S
                (NP (PRP He))
                (VP (VBZ is))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(guess-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, guess-2)
nsubj(sums-5, it-3)
advmod(sums-5, just-4)
ccomp(guess-2, sums-5)
prt(sums-5, up-6)
dobj(is-9, who-7)
nsubj(is-9, He-8)
ccomp(sums-5, is-9)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP He))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP (DT the) (NN Saviour)))
    (. .)))


nsubj(Saviour-4, He-1)
cop(Saviour-4, is-2)
det(Saviour-4, the-3)
root(ROOT-0, Saviour-4)


(ROOT
  (SQ (CC But)
    (FRAG
      (ADVP (RB just))
      (SBAR
        (WHNP (WP what))
        (S
          (VP (VBD did)
            (S
              (NP (PRP he))
              (VP (VB save)
                (NP (PRP us))
                (PP (IN from))))))))
    (. ?)))


root(ROOT-0, But-1)
dep(But-1, just-2)
nsubj(did-4, what-3)
dep(just-2, did-4)
nsubj(save-6, he-5)
ccomp(did-4, save-6)
dobj(save-6, us-7)
prep(save-6, from-8)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Well))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, Well-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (JJS most) (NNS Christians))
    (VP (MD will)
      (VP (VB tell)
        (NP (PRP you))
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (PRP He))
            (VP (VBD was)
              (VP (VBN sent)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB save)
                      (NP (PRP us))
                      (PP (IN from)
                        (NP (PRP$ our) (NNS sins))))))))))))
    (. .)))


amod(Christians-2, most-1)
nsubj(tell-4, Christians-2)
aux(tell-4, will-3)
root(ROOT-0, tell-4)
dobj(tell-4, you-5)
mark(sent-9, that-6)
nsubjpass(sent-9, He-7)
auxpass(sent-9, was-8)
ccomp(tell-4, sent-9)
aux(save-11, to-10)
xcomp(sent-9, save-11)
dobj(save-11, us-12)
prep(save-11, from-13)
poss(sins-15, our-14)
pobj(from-13, sins-15)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT That))
    (VP
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (ADVP (RB indeed))
        (ADJP (JJ true)))
      (CC and)
      (VP
        (SBAR
          (WHADVP (WRB when))
          (S
            (NP (PRP he))
            (VP (VBD died)
              (PP (IN on)
                (NP (DT the) (NNP Cross)))
              (PP (IN on)
                (NP (NNP Good) (NNP Friday))))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(true-4, That-1)
cop(true-4, is-2)
advmod(true-4, indeed-3)
root(ROOT-0, true-4)
cc(true-4, and-5)
advmod(died-8, when-6)
nsubj(died-8, he-7)
conj(true-4, died-8)
prep(died-8, on-9)
det(Cross-11, the-10)
pobj(on-9, Cross-11)
prep(died-8, on-12)
nn(Friday-14, Good-13)
pobj(on-12, Friday-14)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP He))
    (VP (VBD paid)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN penalty))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (PRP$ our) (NNS sins))))
      (SBAR (RB so) (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP we))
          (VP (MD can)
            (VP (VB be)
              (VP (VBN pardoned)
                (PP (IN for)
                  (NP (PDT all) (DT the) (NNS wrongdoings)
                    (SBAR (IN that)
                      (S
                        (NP (PRP we))
                        (VP (VBP have)
                          (ADVP (RB ever))
                          (VP (VBN done)
                            (PP (IN in)
                              (NP (PRP$ our) (NNS lives)))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(paid-2, He-1)
root(ROOT-0, paid-2)
det(penalty-4, the-3)
dobj(paid-2, penalty-4)
prep(penalty-4, of-5)
poss(sins-7, our-6)
pobj(of-5, sins-7)
advmod(pardoned-13, so-8)
mark(pardoned-13, that-9)
nsubjpass(pardoned-13, we-10)
aux(pardoned-13, can-11)
auxpass(pardoned-13, be-12)
advcl(paid-2, pardoned-13)
prep(pardoned-13, for-14)
predet(wrongdoings-17, all-15)
det(wrongdoings-17, the-16)
pobj(for-14, wrongdoings-17)
mark(done-22, that-18)
nsubj(done-22, we-19)
aux(done-22, have-20)
advmod(done-22, ever-21)
ccomp(wrongdoings-17, done-22)
prep(done-22, in-23)
poss(lives-25, our-24)
pobj(in-23, lives-25)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP We))
    (VP (VBP call)
      (S
        (NP (PRP Him))
        (`` ``)
        (NP (NNP Saviour))
        ('' ''))
      (SBAR (IN because)
        (S
          (NP (PRP we))
          (VP (VBP know)
            (SBAR (IN that)
              (S
                (NP (RB not) (JJ only))
                (VP (VBD did)
                  (SBAR
                    (S
                      (NP (PRP he))
                      (VP (VBP die)
                        (PP (IN on)
                          (NP (NNP Good) (NNP Friday)))))))))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(call-2, We-1)
root(ROOT-0, call-2)
dep(Saviour-5, Him-3)
dep(call-2, Saviour-5)
mark(know-9, because-7)
nsubj(know-9, we-8)
advcl(call-2, know-9)
mark(did-13, that-10)
neg(only-12, not-11)
nsubj(did-13, only-12)
ccomp(know-9, did-13)
nsubj(die-15, he-14)
ccomp(did-13, die-15)
prep(die-15, on-16)
nn(Friday-18, Good-17)
pobj(on-16, Friday-18)


(ROOT
  (S (CC but)
    (NP (PRP he))
    (VP
      (VP (VBD came)
        (PRT (RP back))
        (PP (TO to)
          (NP (NN life)))
        (ADVP (RB again)
          (PP (IN on)
            (NP (NNP Sunday)))))
      (CC and)
      (VP
        (ADVP (RB thus))
        (VBD paved)
        (NP (DT the) (NN way))
        (PP (IN for)
          (NP (PRP us)))
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB be)
              (ADJP (JJ right)
                (PP (IN with)
                  (NP (NNP God)))))))))
    (. .)))


cc(came-3, but-1)
nsubj(came-3, he-2)
root(ROOT-0, came-3)
prt(came-3, back-4)
prep(came-3, to-5)
pobj(to-5, life-6)
advmod(came-3, again-7)
prep(again-7, on-8)
pobj(on-8, Sunday-9)
cc(came-3, and-10)
advmod(paved-12, thus-11)
conj(came-3, paved-12)
det(way-14, the-13)
dobj(paved-12, way-14)
prep(paved-12, for-15)
pobj(for-15, us-16)
aux(right-19, to-17)
cop(right-19, be-18)
xcomp(paved-12, right-19)
prep(right-19, with-20)
pobj(with-20, God-21)
